channel.title: Little Bitta Granola on Little Bitta
channel.description: Recent content in Little Bitta Granola on Little Bitta

item.title: About Us
item.description: Little Bitta is a small-batch, baked goods company based in Minnesota. We believe everyone deserves a little treat(or several!) throughout the day. Our mission is to make our community a little sweeter by providing treat that taste just like home. From the time you wake up, to right before bed, we have a Little Bitta something just for you.
